original_text: But made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men:
korean_text: 오히려 자기를 비워 종의 형체를 가지사 사람들과 같이 되셨고

sentences.original_text: But made himself of no reputation
and took upon him the form of a servant
and was made in the likeness of men
